Extensions.​util

Extension functions for the util library.

Functions
Explosion
function util.Explosion(
pos,
ang,
owner,
inflictor,
magnitude,
radius,
doDamage
)

Creates an explosion at a given location.

Parameters
Vector pos

The position to explode.

Angle? ang

The angle of the explosion effect.

Entity? owner

The entity that owns the explosion, used for crediting kills.

Entity? inflictor

The entity to credit as the weapon for any kills made with this explosion.

number magnitude

The magnitude of the explosion, determines the radius and damage.

number? radius

Allows you to override the explosion's radius.

bool? doDamage

Whether to deal damage. Default: true
